ygData.subject: Re: Begging
ygData.msgSnippet: Repeated from the EQ Stratics Trades board, because it s funny. ... Dave s World -No matter where you go, there you are- People will believe a lie either
ygData.messageBody:
Repeated from the EQ Stratics Trades board, because
it's funny.

>>I'm a gnome magician, I beg from my pet elemental
>>while I meditate for mana. Took about 3 weeks... But
>>what else do you hvae to do while sitting on the
>>ground looking at a stupid spell book?

> HAHAHAHA....I love it. I'm gonna have to try that

> "Kenobn, can I have a dollar"
> "No, master"
> "Please? I really need it"
> "I don't have a dollar master"
> "Then what did you do with that infected rat liver I
> gave you?"
> "I ate it master"
> "Come on, you have to have a dollar SOMEWHERE"
> "You're getting on my nerves master"
> ...
> ...
> "Can I have a dollar Kenobn?"
> "No master"

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
